_comment: Created by EFisher on 25/02/2014 18:28:41 using v2.0
title: How has the proportion of cancelled operations changed?
analysis_commentary: When the level of overall activity within the NHS is taken into account, using the number of elective admissions, the ratio of cancelled elective operations decreases, during a time when elective admissions have risen. It doesn't, however, remove the seasonal variation seen with the absolute numbers.
